Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
The Paragon speak with a very formal tone, upper class, elitest society. Highly educated, very sophisticated.
How disappointing. We already took care of this matter ourselves. We no longer need your help.
The imperial guard is crumbling. The plebeians have given in to their savage nature. Help us maintain order within our last bulwark of civilization.
Thank you for helping us. Your reward awaits you.

A group of pirates are ripping implants out of Paragon bodies. These cowards often target defenseless cryo-sleepers, leaving them to die as plebeians. The implants grant us the abilities we need for the resurrection of the Star Union. Follow these thieves and kill them.
Thanks to your efforts, we can sleep safely once more. All squabbling relatives can be returned to their tombs now. You have our gratitude.
Our great monuments and works of art attract a range of enemies. Our refined ways trigger rage in savage minds, as if smashing things they don’t understand makes the world right for them.
Thanks to you, the intruders are exterminated. Your reward awaits you.

A usurper has arisen, pretending to be the new Emperor, riling the plebs. There is only one true Emperor, and they shall return the Star Union to us. Stop this heretic and the false promises it spews from its rotten implant.
"Emperor" refers to the Emperor of the Star Union.
Thanks to you, we have stopped a major uprising driven by a charlatan. You have our sincerest gratitude.
Build the Prosthetic Replacements for the Paragon

As the last heirs of the Star Union, it is one of the many duties of the Paragon to uphold the cultural and technological legacy of our ancestors. We have witnessed the decline of the Dark Age and must commit ourselves to favor those few that show there can still be knowledgeable and civilized people in this rotten era. The question is, {STR_LeaderName}, will you be one of them?
"Dark Age" refers to the Cosmic Dark Age of the Star Union.

It is an act of cruelty that even in our victories we are reminded of our fading perfection. Nonetheless, you have our gratitude and that of our Prefect, {STR_LeaderName}. May you live to see the return of the old Emperors!
"Prefect" refers to the leader of the Paragon.
The Paragon are slowly decaying. They need replacement body parts to replace their failing implants.[br/][br/]Complete this special production project to complete a quest given to you by the Paragon.
Produce Luxury Goods for the Paragon

We were chosen to experience heaven in this life, in this reality. We have tasted the finest wines, drank from golden cups and worn the smoothest silks. These may seem like superficial things to you, but to our finely-augmented senses, anything less is torture. Our god has forsaken us. Help us raise our standard of living back to the Paragon ideal.
"God" refers the the Emperor of the Star Union.
We toast to your generosity. We have found a new redeemer.
The Paragon were once people from the upper echelons of Star Union society. They are relying on us to provide them with some of those comforts again.

Thieves! Traitors! Despicable scum! No, not you, {STR_LeaderName}. We are talking about the petty group of pirates that recently started terrorizing our settlements. They fight without honor, steal our technology and raid our citizens for their indispensable implants. Should you deal with this threat, our Prefect will make sure you are generously rewarded!
It is most satisfying to see those miserable desecrators brought to justice. You have our gratitude!

First weeds appeared in the roads. Then parks started to expand beyond their boundaries. Now wild beasts maraud our grand boulevards. We need to stop the onslaught of nature! Destroy these beast so that civilization can flourish.
How grand it is to see civilization triumph over nature's overgrowth. Thank you for your service.
Research Treatise Civilis for the Paragon

As the last heirs of the Star Union, it is one of the many duties of the Paragon to uphold the cultural and technological legacy of our ancestors. We have witnessed the decline of the Dark Age and must commit ourselves to favor those few that show there can still be knowledgeable and civilized people in this rotten era. The question is, {STR_LeaderName}, will you be one of them?

The first steps of your people towards the path of wisdom are like droplets of water in this desert of ignorance. There is hope for you yet, {STR_LeaderName}! Accept these gifts as a token of our support.
A compendium of cultural, morale and philosophical topics and how to handle them.

There was a time when our maintenance servants kept vast and beautiful gardens. This land was a paradise. Now, it seems even the trees hate us. We desire that a particularly nasty patch of weeds be destroyed. They apparently don’t want to go, and killed our few remaining groundskeepers, continuing to infest the land with their Growth.
It may not be the same as the grand gardens of the past, but we applaud your green thumb. Thank you for helping us weed these lands. Here’s payment for your efforts.

It is a thing of legend to find the den of some creature that terrorizes the people and plunder its lair. The old Empire considered it a most refined sport. Of course, it is not for everyone. Packs of Hopperhounds have been seen in the area, eating the citizenry. We invite you to join the Grand Hunt. Find their lair and destroy what creatures you find there.
Well done! Bravo, bravo! Such bravery. You are a great hunter. Take this, your prize for the hunt.

Under the rule of the great emperors, we witnessed a time of growth and prosperity. Alas, that time is almost forgotten. We have lost the tools that once built the great structures of that era, but all is not lost. {STR_LeaderName}, take up the mantle of memory. Kindle the hearts of your people the past. Awaken our dreams by building monuments to the emperors of the past.

I see your cities... how these monuments gleam with the past. Truly the past will never be forgotten. It’s beautiful, truly marvelous! You have done a great service to the Paragon, {STR_LeaderName}. Please, accept our payment.
Building these monuments will impress the Paragon... and the Paragon are not easily impressed.
Research and prototype elite Paragon Bionics

We have lost technology from the past, and the means to research and develop our most elite Paragon privileges. Your colony is advancing. With our guidance, you might be able to restore technologies we once thought lost to legend. Using the following bionics, could you show us if you can upgrade these very powerful implants?
With this new research, we can replace our old bionics with stronger, more sustainable enhancements. The Paragon thank you, {STR_LeaderName}. Your reward.
Whether they admit it or not, the Paragon's cybernetics are old and outdated. A few upgrades will surely help them.
A popular meme from the TV show, "The Simpsons".
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

Ruffians, outlaws, thugs! How dare they oppose the will of the Paragon? While we struggle to feed the children of our land, these robbers plunder and steal, causing the poor to suffer. There is no future in this. {STR_LeaderName}, will you rid us of their menace? Think of the children!
{STR_LeaderName} can be either male/female. "Children" refers to citizens.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Good riddance. Thank you for your efforts, {STR_LeaderName}. The children of this land will sleep well tonight knowing you will protect them.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

We recall the day the Vanguard did as they’re told. Unfortunately, that is no longer the case. It seems the turmoil in the Union has led the Vanguard to think they should have a say. They even had the audacity to turn on us. They need to be brought to justice. To set an example, you see.
A lesson in justice that our subordinates are sure to remember. You have our gratitude, {STR_LeaderName}.
Seeing your lack of results, we took care of the matter ourselves. May your future actions be less disappointing, {STR_LeaderName}, lest we make an example out of you too.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Research the Paragon expectations of civil life
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Behold. Here is a compendium of cultural, moral and philosophical topics and how to handle them. Come before us adorned in the trappings of moral refinement.
Aka, show the Paragon you can live up to their moral standards.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

Your impeccable sensibilities are adequate to interact with our kind at this current level. There are many levels we expect you to master, but you have demonstrated a capacity to learn we haven’t seen in generations. Congratulations, here is your reward.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Learn and put into practice that demonstrates you can comfortably integrate with the Paragon’s strict moral and philosophical codes.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Research holographic overlays to restore Paragon beauty
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

Once our flesh was beautiful. We were gods among our children. Now our flesh rots and despite our best cellular regeneration we suffer the ghastly visage of time. We have heard, however, that the races of today make use of holographic technology that may help us restore our beauty . Research how they do what they do, and apply it to restore our youth.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
We thank you for providing us with new faces. We can now appear as we once did, even if it is all mirage. Yet, is not all life an illusion? Oh! Friend vanity, we greet you anew.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Restore the Paragon to their former beauty. Modify holographic overlays, thus allowing the Paragon to wear an image of their former youth and cover their ghastly decay.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
